The 2016 Season

We're excited to compete in the 2016 FIRST Robotics Competition season, FIRST Stronghold! We're spending six weeks building our robot to compete in this year's game. You can learn more about the game by watching the game reveal video.

LINK

The L&N STEMpunks

We're students from the L&N STEM Academy with a passion to learn and innovate. We work to spread STEM education and FIRST programs throughout the East Tennessee region. Although the FIRST Robotics Competition focuses on building robots, many of our members specialize in other fields such as design, business management, media production, and programming.

L&N STEM Academy

We're located in the heart of downtown Knoxville, Tennessee at the L&N STEM Academy, the 12th best high school in the state. We're a short walk away from the iconic Sunsphere and Knoxville Convention Center, where the Smoky Mountain Regional is held.

LINK

FIRST

FIRST’s mission is to inspire young people to be science and technology leaders, by engaging them in exciting mentor-based programs that build science, engineering, and technology skills, that inspire innovation, and that foster well-rounded life capabilities including self-confidence, communication, and leadership.

Get STEMpunked!

We're students from the L&N STEM Academy in downtown Knoxville, Tennessee with a passion to learn and innovate. We participate in the FIRST Robotics Competition each year.
